allow: Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF'' fix: eliminar todos os 139 ESLint warnings \(0 errors, 0 warnings\) - Remove 118 unused imports/variables across 61 files - Add eslint-disable for 10 legitimate uses \(tracking pixels, blob URLs, external images\) - Add eslint-disable for 12 intentional react-hooks/exhaustive-deps \(mount-only effects\) - Fix ref dependency in useInViewOnce hook - Prefix unused params with _ in API routes Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.6 EOF \)")

Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
fix: eliminar 8 ESLint errors em analytics-events.ts \(any types\)

- Replace Record<string, any> with Record<string, unknown>
- Remove `as any` casts for window.fbq
- Fix Window interface declaration to use unknown[]

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.6 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")

Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
fix: corrigir CSP que bloqueava navegação e React state update warnings

- CSP: substituir nonces por ''unsafe-inline'' no script-src \(Next.js injeta
  scripts inline para hidratação que não suportam nonces automaticamente\)
- CSP: adicionar wildcards para domínios Google AdSense \(*.googlesyndication.com,
  *.doubleclick.net, *.google.com, *.adtrafficquality.google\)
- CSP: adicionar ''unsafe-eval'' apenas em dev \(necessário para HMR/react-refresh\)
- Remover sistema de nonces \(generateNonce, x-nonce header, nonce props\)
- Mover leituras de localStorage de lazy initializers para useEffect em 8 ficheiros
  \(WishlistContext, HorseFavoritesContext, LanguageContext, TabContext,
  useLocalStorage, TabSystem, JornalListClient, AdvancedFilters\)
- Corrige: navegação client-side bloqueada pelo CSP
- Corrige: "Can 't perform React state update on unmounted component"

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.6 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")

Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
fix: corrigir CSP que bloqueava navegação e React state update warnings

- CSP: substituir nonces por ''unsafe-inline'' no script-src \(Next.js injeta
  scripts inline para hidratação que não suportam nonces automaticamente\)
- CSP: adicionar wildcards para domínios Google AdSense \(*.googlesyndication.com,
  *.doubleclick.net, *.google.com, *.adtrafficquality.google\)
- CSP: adicionar ''unsafe-eval'' apenas em dev \(necessário para HMR/react-refresh\)
- Remover sistema de nonces \(generateNonce, x-nonce header, nonce props\)
- Mover leituras de localStorage de lazy initializers para useEffect em contextos
  \(WishlistContext, HorseFavoritesContext, LanguageContext, TabContext,
  TabSystem, JornalListClient, AdvancedFilters\)
- Corrige: navegação client-side bloqueada pelo CSP
- Corrige: "Can 't perform React state update on unmounted component"

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.6 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
Bash(for dir in jornal directorio eventos ferramentas comprar linhagens calculadora-valor comparador-cavalos verificador-compatibilidade analise-perfil piroplasmose vender-cavalo)

Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
fix: limpar console.logs, adicionar redirects e corrigir .env.example

- Remover console.log de DashboardContent \(mock actions\) e analytics-events \(debug GA4/Meta\)
- Adicionar redirects 301: /favoritos → /cavalos-favoritos, /vender → /vender-cavalo, /marketplace → /comprar
- .env.example: corrigir naming Shopify \(NEXT_PUBLIC_\), adicionar STRIPE_TOOLS_PRICE_ID, SANITY_API_WRITE_TOKEN, ADMIN_EMAIL/PASSWORD, NEXT_PUBLIC_BASE_URL

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.6 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
